titleStmt.title: The anatomy of Urania practica or, a short mathematicall discourse; laying open the errors and impertinencies delivered in a treatise lately published by Mr. Vincent Wing, and Mr. William Leybourne, under the title of Urania practica. By Jeremy Shakerley philomath.
titleStmt.author: Shakerley, Jeremy, fl. 1651.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Wing, Vincent. Urania practica.
The last four pages are misnumbered.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
